price: Basi waulize: Ati Mola wako Mlezi ndiye mwenye watoto wa kike, na wao wanao watoto wa kiume?.
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waulize watu wako: Ati Mwenyezi Mungu aliye kuumba ana watoto wa kike kinyume na wao; na wao ndio wana watoto wanaume kinyuma na Yeye?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
